title: Health care, pensions are part of social welfare

content.question: Health care, pensions, unemployment insurance, and direct economic assistance to those in need are

choices.label: impossible to study comparatively because of international diversity
basic values of new social movements
examples of provision of public policies
common features of unofficial patron-client networks
widely seen as being absent under the Soviet style of socialism

content.answer: examples of provision of public policies

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
